function.name: get_route_distance
function.description: Calculate road distance between two locations.
function.long_description: Calculates the driving route distance between two geographic coordinates using real road network data from an external routing service.
example_user_queries: Calculate driving distance between two locations
How far is the route between these coordinates?
Road distance between point A and point B
Driving distance between two GPS points
How many kilometers by road between these locations?
